meanings.sent1: The clergywomen led the church service with grace and compassion.
meanings.sent2: She admired the clergywomen for their dedication to serving their community.
meanings.sent3: The clergywomen joked that their superpower was spreading kindness wherever they went.
meanings.sent4: In the world of faith, clergywomen are the guiding stars for many believers.
meanings.sent5: The image of the clergywomen in their robes left a lasting impression on the congregation.

meanings.definition: A female member of the clergy.
meanings.sent1: The clergywomen offered comforting words to those in need of solace.
meanings.sent2: As a clergywomen, she found fulfillment in helping others find peace.
meanings.sent3: The clergywomen playfully debated who had the best singing voice among them.
meanings.sent4: Her presence as a clergywomen brought a sense of tranquility to the troubled souls.
meanings.sent5: The community respected the clergywomen for their unwavering support and guidance.
